cabin.quest.00003FCBB33E62C4.description: - &6The Bulletin Board&r provides means to earn currency for Trading.
Here you can complete various errands or buy a profession permit for use in the Trading Machine.
- &6The Market&r gives you options to spend your money on a variety of fun and useful items and gadgets.
- &6Shipments&r are the Automated way to exchange coin for resources. Here you can buy Import Cards for use in the Trading Machine.

- The &3Factory Guide&r provides useful information for the path of Technology and Automation. All challenges to be overcome have been neatly organised into chapters and tasks. It is entirely optional to follow this Guide.
- The Section on &3Metallurgy&r gives an overview of the ways to turn your ore into refined metal. Different paths yield differently.
- &3Lifesavers&r brings a spotlight to all those little utilities that can help you overcome the challenges set before you.

cabin.quest.05446225038D260A.description: As an alternative, more risky approach to a refined Silicon resource, Laser Alchemy can provide an obscure yet rewarding new path of progression.
Discover the secret codes of each reagent class in order to learn about the recipe of Chaos Catalysts.
Once found, the Chaos Catalyst can not only transmute a material into Silicon, but potentially create other valuable resources from the most trivial ingredients!

At this point, all of the tools necessary to facilitate space travel have become accessible. Might as well start a countdown.

cabin.quest.106C6DFDCB97327C.description: Gathering Andesite manually takes time. Thankfully, bedrock can cause lava to form Andesite infinitely.
At this time it is best to set up drills to break generated blocks between lava and water.
Since bedrock is blocking the space beneath, you'll have to find a way to collect the drops from other sides.

cabin.quest.1127129CBA2B5E6F.description: With new circuitry and wiring capability, you can make your factory a little smarter. Also those lamps you can make are really pretty.

For an actual piece of advice: it is pretty simple to set up a little circuit at a few points in your factory, which detect when an item has not been produced in a while. You can use redstone links to redirect those signals to a central control room, giving you an overview of which sections require maintenance.
The circuit on site is basically a tug of war between a slow timer and a content observer detecting the items. The Counter available from circuit stonecutting works perfectly for this.
cabin.quest.1127129CBA2B5E6F.title: Control Centre
cabin.quest.1139F2E4E6FCFE29.description: The Cobblestone first needs to be milled down into Gravel.

cabin.quest.174E3A810535CAAC.description: Not part of the Mechanism Chain, yet very important for creating relevant machines.
Using Melters, Fluid Pipes and a Mechanical Mixer, you can create a couple of different metal alloys. Brass is one of them.
Pumping the Molten Alloy into a Casting Table or Basin will Solidify it into usable Ingots.
For less hassles with manual effort, it is recommended to set up Ingot-to-Ingot semi-automation for creating Alloys using the setup above.
cabin.quest.174E3A810535CAAC.title: The Alloy Mixer
cabin.quest.185F9F8EBD0F8F87.description: A small pack of upgrades for your 'pack.
cabin.quest.185F9F8EBD0F8F87.subtitle: 20 Silver
cabin.quest.185F9F8EBD0F8F87.title: Craft and Stash
cabin.quest.1861E583C9DAA0BA.description: Finally, a fully grown crystal. Don't forget to send every second one back around for seed production!

cabin.quest.1947C6CE179EBAC6.description: Your entire factory will be put to the test as final products flow into the Data Centre, programming the Guidance computer of your Spaceship.
Every step is different, some may even differ depending on the generation seed of your World.
cabin.quest.1947C6CE179EBAC6.title: III
cabin.quest.194B973EAF17809C.description: For this next trick a supply of Wooden Sticks is required. Whether that calls for a new harvester or just a scheduled shipment from Contraption 1 is up to you.

cabin.quest.1A383F96B312D1B8.title: Pyrolyzer Round II

The precious Cobalt required can be found in the Nether.

cabin.quest.1D1D1FEAF49C5E11.description: A central role in your Laboratory is played by the Alchemical Laser.

The Laser is the only way to obtain Catalysts or to find the necessary clues toward their recipe. Another use is the actual application of the Chaos Catalyst to a specific Reagent, causing the Transmutation.
Inventors can familiarise themselves with the necessary machinery components via JEI or via entering

cabin.quest.1D4AA0F29FA698F2.title: 4x Glow Lichen

cabin.quest.1D6150F2480B976E.title: 8x Nether Quartz
cabin.quest.1D9D65FBD06DD481.description: Every Zinc Machine will end up using 24 Buckets of Lava in Production. It's not a great ecological footprint, but even just one Hose Pulley can make quick work of it.
Remember that trains can cross through nether portals, perhaps this can help you.
cabin.quest.1D9D65FBD06DD481.subtitle: Contraption 18-1
cabin.quest.1D9D65FBD06DD481.title: A lot. of lava
cabin.quest.1DBFD0B34659A8F9.description: This torch can completely stop hostile mob spawns in a large radius, great for those wishing to do moody builds without having to deal with mobs.
cabin.quest.1DBFD0B34659A8F9.title: Mob-Be-Gone
cabin.quest.1DD2802F5611D419.description: Thermal's fluidducts move fluids without requiring SU to do so. Servos, placed on connections, are used to import fluids into the pipes, and filters are used to control what can be exported from a given pipe.
You can use a Cresent Hammer to rightclick the pipe connection attached to the blcok in order to enable/disable the connection.
cabin.quest.1DD2802F5611D419.title: Easier Fluid Movement
cabin.quest.1E26046FA8177616.description: Sell &6Igneous Rocks&f, &6Metal Ores&f, &6Gems&f and more with the Mining permit.

cabin.quest.1E263994D4883A08.description: The chicken and egg problem remains: in order to automate precision mechanisms for brass equipment more conveniently, having more brass equipment would be really useful!
After hitting the Checkmark above, the second Chapter of the Factory Guide will become accessible from the Quest Sidebar.

cabin.quest.1E263994D4883A08.title: Alluring Expedience
cabin.quest.1EF5AB1D7882167F.title: 4x Barley
cabin.quest.1F05704C3B1FA528.title: 1x Shulker Shell
cabin.quest.20CB646041616191.title: 1x Wool
cabin.quest.210A3F8C44AAD89A.title: 1x Phantom Membrane
cabin.quest.2131996D22A87667.description: Brew them together and you get haste, no beacon required!
cabin.quest.2131996D22A87667.subtitle: Contraption 19-3
cabin.quest.2131996D22A87667.title: Fast Fluid
cabin.quest.2167272204B6627B.description: Route the nuggets into your High-Temperature melting equipment. A Melter from Tinkers' Construct, for example.
cabin.quest.2167272204B6627B.subtitle: Contraption 15-4
cabin.quest.2167272204B6627B.title: Get Melted
cabin.quest.21CC162C06BBFAE6.title: 16x Redstone Dust
cabin.quest.21E76761CD3761C2.subtitle: 1 to 3
cabin.quest.21E76761CD3761C2.title: Smelting
cabin.quest.22202C87352242D6.description: A new Shipment of Sand should be scheduled, for it is significantly rich in silicon.
cabin.quest.22202C87352242D6.subtitle: Contraption 31-1
cabin.quest.22202C87352242D6.title: Sand Delivery
cabin.quest.222EEB7DB1D98484.title: 16x Dead Log
cabin.quest.223BB57AD0239511.description: For the all-mighty Infernal Mechanism, a bountiful source of soul essence is needed. Thankfully, the vines of the underworld seem to carry it in them.
Twisting Vines grow upwards, you can gather them using Mechanical Harvesters.
cabin.quest.223BB57AD0239511.subtitle: Contraption 17-1
cabin.quest.223BB57AD0239511.title: The Double Decker I
cabin.quest.2268AFAF6E9AB5E2.description: The process of refining silicon requires a blend of Sand Crystals, Fine Sand and the Carbon Catalyst.
cabin.quest.2268AFAF6E9AB5E2.subtitle: Contraption 36
cabin.quest.2268AFAF6E9AB5E2.title: The Merge
cabin.quest.239C64263B91350D.description: Drop all the harvested vines into a Heated Mixing Basin.
cabin.quest.239C64263B91350D.subtitle: Contraption 17-3
cabin.quest.239C64263B91350D.title: Soul Distillery
cabin.quest.23F9DB562ED7C2F6.title: 1x Rib Bone
cabin.quest.24328C973480E4E8.title: 16x Crimson Stem
cabin.quest.2441491CB5D5E57D.description: 3-3, 2-2, 8-8,...? A total of 39 options exist to calculate zeros. A tough decision!
cabin.quest.2441491CB5D5E57D.subtitle: Contraption 44-8
cabin.quest.24C48CFAAD71B230.description: Additional Processors are required in creating logistical components of ME Technology. At some point some Semi-Automation should come into consideration.
cabin.quest.24C48CFAAD71B230.subtitle: Contraption 41-1
cabin.quest.24C48CFAAD71B230.title: Express Circuitry I
cabin.quest.24FFFE0FC9EAEF8D.description: Set up a little cycle to recharge any Certus Quartz used as a Catalyst in Contraption 13-2.
The Charger from AE2 can be used here, along with the Item Trasportation of choice.
cabin.quest.24FFFE0FC9EAEF8D.subtitle: Contraption 14
cabin.quest.24FFFE0FC9EAEF8D.title: The (Re-)Charger
cabin.quest.252B9DD5BFB8184A.description: Aimlessly traversing the nether is just the worst. This reward will give you the exact location of the nearest fortress.
Make sure to actually be in the nether before claiming this one.
cabin.quest.252B9DD5BFB8184A.title: Fortress Locator
cabin.quest.258C779897D1AEF0.title: 8x Lapis Lazuli
cabin.quest.25B76A897D97C9F1.description: Both Heavy and Light Oil are then further refined into suitable Rocket Fuel.
cabin.quest.25B76A897D97C9F1.subtitle: Contraption 46
cabin.quest.25B76A897D97C9F1.title: Hydrocarbon Sorter III
cabin.quest.25D02F1FB231C466.title: 1x Sculk Block
cabin.quest.26173D4777F439B1.description: A new Energy Unit joins the ranks: the production facility for silicon will involve an interplay of thermal induction machinery and the familiar kinetic components.
Between Flux and Stress, a peculiar innovation in Laser technology will be required to produce some of the ingredients involved.
After hitting the Checkmark above, the fourth Chapter of the Factory Guide will become accessible from the Quest Sidebar.
cabin.quest.26173D4777F439B1.subtitle: Chapter 4
cabin.quest.26173D4777F439B1.title: Into the Box
cabin.quest.262F369CE9CA7C87.title: 16x Andesite
cabin.quest.26A1E68DA7ACB025.description: Aside from the Inductive Mechanism, Invar Machinery builds on a tough Metal Alloy between Iron and Nickel.
Since the full refinement process of Invar takes a few lengthy steps, automation is recommended.
cabin.quest.26A1E68DA7ACB025.subtitle: Contraption 30
cabin.quest.26A1E68DA7ACB025.title: Mechanical Auto Hammer
cabin.quest.26C39961F2E2ABF2.description: Especially while building new Contraptions, this gadget is incredibly handy. Instead of filling up your pockets with components, you can remotely access the toolbox with a keybind. It also has a increased stacksize.
cabin.quest.26C39961F2E2ABF2.title: Engineer's Companion
cabin.quest.26DD1CA6A8D4E249.description: Refined fuel can be made from either heavy oil or light oil.
cabin.quest.26DD1CA6A8D4E249.title: Hydrocarbon Sorter II
cabin.quest.2714FE0125D3E953.title: 1x Zombie heart
cabin.quest.27C191346BB14D9D.description: For production of chromatic materials, a colour pigment is needed. It is up to you which colour dye should be automated for this purpose. The only exception is white dye.
cabin.quest.27C191346BB14D9D.subtitle: Contraption 25
cabin.quest.27C191346BB14D9D.title: Your Favourite Colour
cabin.quest.286510750C333C1F.description: When dropped as an item, Chromatic Compound will absorb light around itself and eventually turn into Refined Radiance. Choose one of three approaches:
- Autoplacing light emitting blocks near the dropped compound items (blocks need line of sight to item)
- Supplying light emitting blocks as items on nearby depots/belts (blocks need line of sight to item)
- Throwing the compound into a Beacon Beam for free and instant conversion
cabin.quest.286510750C333C1F.subtitle: Contraption 28-1
cabin.quest.286510750C333C1F.title: Throwing Flash
cabin.quest.286C553AD3E15266.subtitle: 7 Silver
cabin.quest.286C553AD3E15266.title: 4x Willow Vine
cabin.quest.28DAED70768C6A50.description: Great work! The final assembly line is now complete. Your factory just entered the Digital Age.

If you have not used AE2 before, it's highly recommended to learn it; Even just a basic autocrafting setup can save you a ton of time. This quest will link a guide, that while for 1.12.2, just about everything carries over.
New options have opened up in the Overview. Whenever you are ready.
cabin.quest.28DAED70768C6A50.title: Chapter 4 Complete!
cabin.quest.29696B4965010CED.title: 4x Prismarine Shard
cabin.quest.29B58A9EDA478E7D.title: Hunt the Undead II
cabin.quest.29D37095C73B3DEC.description: Finally, smelt the raw rubber into its cured state.
cabin.quest.29D37095C73B3DEC.subtitle: Contraption 9-3
cabin.quest.29D37095C73B3DEC.title: Curing by Flame
cabin.quest.29DABB5FDE6356E9.title: IIIa: Nugget
cabin.quest.2A9AAED667A95C6E.title: Igneous Sample Collection
cabin.quest.2B195E5B195246F5.description: If this is Unlocked, you have gathered all reagents of the Herbal Category.
The Herbal Catalyst can be created by a combination of four reagents of this Category in the Alchemical Laser. &7(See the Catalyst's JEI entry for more information)
cabin.quest.2B8F1D804107EB8C.description: Assembling the Processors is not a trivial process. But it sure is fun to watch it work.
cabin.quest.2B8F1D804107EB8C.subtitle: Contraption 41-2
cabin.quest.2B8F1D804107EB8C.title: Express Circuitry II
cabin.quest.2BB2C7B95E3C89AE.description: The Prospect of Teleportation alone might be reason enough to explore that mysterious End Dimension.
In researching the required technologies, you will find that your hard earned silver suddenly finds a second use..
After hitting the Checkmark above, additional Quests located in the Third Chapter will be revealed.
cabin.quest.2BB2C7B95E3C89AE.subtitle: Bonus 3A
cabin.quest.2BB2C7B95E3C89AE.title: Melting the Funds
cabin.quest.2BD76CB3F8BC215E.description: Crude Oil can be refined into Heavy Oil using a Fractionating Still.
cabin.quest.2BD76CB3F8BC215E.title: Hydrocarbon Sorter I
cabin.quest.2BE033F631A778D9.title: IV: Ingot
cabin.quest.2C10D18D55335B7E.title: 16x Granite
cabin.quest.2C2E304910D7F33D.subtitle: 1 to 2, Byproducts
cabin.quest.2C2E304910D7F33D.title: Washing
cabin.quest.2C40901DB42DD8F8.description: Draining paint balls creates a significant amount of liquid byproduct, which has to be disposed of before it starts clogging up the production line.
cabin.quest.2C40901DB42DD8F8.title: Toxic Byproducts
cabin.quest.2C7ADB6C11B918B1.description: About fifty inventions lie between you and the moon.
Thousands of components will flow through the ever-growing sequence of your machines, providing the means to explore the next level of technology.
cabin.quest.2C7ADB6C11B918B1.title: II
cabin.quest.2C81D358594C4352.description: By Crushing the Crushing Wheels using Crushing Wheels, a strange anomaly is created and dropped. We can use this to our advantage.
cabin.quest.2C81D358594C4352.subtitle: Contraption 20-3
cabin.quest.2C81D358594C4352.title: Inception
cabin.quest.2C9012E65F43EC72.title: 32x Olivestone Bricks
cabin.quest.2CB570195DA7E106.description: Building Material, Fuel and Ingredient. A passive supply of timber would be a good first effort.
Mechanical Saws are a powerful way to achieve this.
cabin.quest.2CB570195DA7E106.subtitle: Contraption 1
cabin.quest.2CB570195DA7E106.title: Automatic Forest
cabin.quest.2CCD84D55DE71EB2.description: Mixing the Entangled Singularities with a dye of choice creates the very essence of colour! Just what we need for producing a perfected chromatic compound.
cabin.quest.2CCD84D55DE71EB2.subtitle: Contraption 26-1
cabin.quest.2CCD84D55DE71EB2.title: Painting Space itself
cabin.quest.2D022872F99F9907.subtitle: 64 Silver
cabin.quest.2D022872F99F9907.title: 4x Invar Ingot
cabin.quest.2D75D1864FB1EF75.title: Pet Owner's Starter Pack
cabin.quest.2DC3AA8A89005C42.description: Zinc Machines are incredibly powerful. From efficient Cobblestone Harvesters to long-ranged Item Collectors, a useful new suite of equipment now sits at the ready.
Note that Infernal Mechanisms are an ingredient to nothing else. The main assembly line will continue with Precision Mechanisms.
cabin.quest.2DC3AA8A89005C42.title: Zinc Machinery
cabin.quest.2E10D7FE1BC4FDBB.title: 1x Chelicerae
cabin.quest.2E692532C4C69001.title: 1x Glowing Moss Block
cabin.quest.2F2BA8C2AC2E0B93.subtitle: 60 Silver
cabin.quest.2F2BA8C2AC2E0B93.title: Keeping in Shape
cabin.quest.2F469F6F1511D9C4.description: Construction wands can extend complete walls or surfaces of blocks by the click of a button.
You can add a destruction core to give it the option to destory blocks instead.
cabin.quest.2F469F6F1511D9C4.title: Blockstacker
cabin.quest.2F50046724A0DF9C.description: Ender Machines provide not only access to instant Teleportation, but also to the most powerful upgrades for your machines.
cabin.quest.2F50046724A0DF9C.title: Ender Machinery
cabin.quest.2FFFE1C5366930BB.description: The contraptions of Chapter 2 require a healthy supply of water. The easiest way is to pull from water sources directly using Mechanical Pumps and a fluid pipe network.
cabin.quest.2FFFE1C5366930BB.title: Water Supply
cabin.quest.3025B5861FE17ADF.description: The production of Refined Radiance requires either a steady supply of light emitting blocks, or an active Beacon Beam.
Choose which path you would like to take, and provide necessary preparation/automation.
cabin.quest.3025B5861FE17ADF.subtitle: Contraption 27
cabin.quest.3025B5861FE17ADF.title: Let there be light
cabin.quest.302FCD205CC2F708.description: Being almost there, all the Paint Balls now brought to the blue frequency will have to be run through the Item Drain one last time.
cabin.quest.302FCD205CC2F708.title: Spectral Correction (Blue)
cabin.quest.3126DE83A6741671.description: The second available Digit is the Eight. It can be cast from unprocessed logic.

From here, plan via which calculations the other digits will be created, and how the cost can be minimised. Remember that each added calculation step ends up increasing the amount of Calculation Mechanisms required for the digit it leads to.
cabin.quest.3126DE83A6741671.subtitle: Contraption 43-3
cabin.quest.31EDFA6D2FF86CB0.description: Now that you have an idea of what is new and what is not, settle in and start your Journey.
cabin.quest.31EDFA6D2FF86CB0.title: Off you go
cabin.quest.3249CD08992F2BCD.description: A Pyrolisation process is not strictly required for Charcoal, but the increased yield makes it worthwhile if the wood supply is limited.
cabin.quest.3249CD08992F2BCD.subtitle: Contraption 34-2
cabin.quest.3249CD08992F2BCD.title: Pyrolyzer Round I
cabin.quest.32786E9D145FFE25.description: Smelt the Algal blend into bricks. While a Furnace works great, an Encased Fan can do it without the need of Fuel.
cabin.quest.32786E9D145FFE25.subtitle: Contraption 6-3
cabin.quest.32786E9D145FFE25.title: Algae Cooker
cabin.quest.32C46B11BDAD7632.description: Sell &6Tools&f, &6Armour&f and more with the Smithing permit.
cabin.quest.32C46B11BDAD7632.title: Blacksmith
cabin.quest.334146C815B304DB.description: Belts and Arms are great, but sometimes we will still give in to the guilty pleasure of using item pipes.
These tubes however can even serve as a pretty sophisticated logistical infrastructure. Blocks like the Item- or Crafting Terminal will be able to request items from any chests connected to them.
cabin.quest.334146C815B304DB.title: Pressure Tube
cabin.quest.33674138F4866C18.description: Creosote is created as a by-product. It can be used as an additional Fuel Source.
cabin.quest.33674138F4866C18.title: Coal Juice
cabin.quest.339BC75AD23B70D7.title: 4x Feather
cabin.quest.33B5C951B4AE8322.subtitle: 11 Silver
cabin.quest.33B5C951B4AE8322.title: 8x Sweet Berries
cabin.quest.342BB6EF80EBFDCA.description: Copper Machines unlock the capability of Fluid Manipulation. Fill, drain, filter and collect liquids for all of your automation needs.
Note that Sealed Mechanisms are an ingredient to nothing else. The main assembly line will continue with Kinetic Mechanisms.
cabin.quest.342BB6EF80EBFDCA.title: Copper Machinery
cabin.quest.343050A40A3AB1F0.description: Enriching coarse sand with earth charges creates Sand Crystals. Not much more processing is left until the Silicon content reaches a state usable for circuits.
cabin.quest.343050A40A3AB1F0.subtitle: Contraption 33-3
cabin.quest.343050A40A3AB1F0.title: Crystalline Sand
cabin.quest.345B94F6D17605CD.description: This piece of quartz is too small. With enough water we might get somewhere.
cabin.quest.345B94F6D17605CD.subtitle: Contraption 12-1
cabin.quest.345B94F6D17605CD.title: Quartz Seeds
cabin.quest.34A1D176C78FB64E.subtitle: Contraption 12-2
cabin.quest.34A1D176C78FB64E.title: Growth Started
cabin.quest.352F5F851045653A.subtitle: 1 to 3-6
cabin.quest.352F5F851045653A.title: Crushing
cabin.quest.35F97137A46C1F3C.title: 16x Birch Log
cabin.quest.36B5C3ECFD38670E.title: 16x Ice
cabin.quest.36E02479368EAF04.description: &6The Bulletin Board&r provides means to earn currency for Trading.
cabin.quest.36E02479368EAF04.title: The Bulletin Board
cabin.quest.3728DF562D6DCE3A.description: Liquid resin can be extracted from healthy Trees using Arboreal Extractors. The more the merrier.
cabin.quest.3728DF562D6DCE3A.subtitle: Contraption 9-1
cabin.quest.3728DF562D6DCE3A.title: Ah wait, don't chop
cabin.quest.374933A06E016CE9.description: If you know LUA (or are willing to learn), computercraft is can be a very strong tool in your factory, as computercraft can read information from create blocks.
cabin.quest.374933A06E016CE9.title: Programming the future
cabin.quest.375C9A43FE5620B6.description: Transmuting the purple reactive blend requires very special heating conditions, only available on Campfires or Stoves.
cabin.quest.375C9A43FE5620B6.subtitle: Contraption 22-3
cabin.quest.375C9A43FE5620B6.title: Cooking up some Ender Dust
cabin.quest.381F8F373605BB97.description: Crushing Dyed Singularities has a chance to yield little orbs of yellow colour, aswell.
Much like the red ones, these have to be drained once again to shift the frequency in the right direction.
cabin.quest.381F8F373605BB97.title: Spectral Correction (Yellow)
cabin.quest.382EBC32AC27C839.description: If you are looking for extra large but specialised storage space in a block, check out Functional Storage.
cabin.quest.382EBC32AC27C839.title: Big Barrels II
cabin.quest.38B063C8DE71E86D.description: The Special properties of Silver can prove useful in creating Enderium Alloy.
As it turns out, the only source of Silver seems to be your money. Makes you wonder where the official mints get it from...
cabin.quest.38B063C8DE71E86D.title: Insert Coin
cabin.quest.38CD5CE18FE09D23.title: 1x Emerald
cabin.quest.38D19F4EC634F33B.description: Slimy Ferns have the property of instant regeneration when exposed to Spirit Fire. Much like the Quartz Incubator in the other Factory, we can use this property to create a passive supply.

The cycle is simple: Cut the fern plant into halves using a Deployer, then throw one of the leaves into Spirit Fire. It is recommended to ensure that all colours of fern are duplicated at similar rates.
Create Spirit Fire by tossing a Demon's Dream Fruit on the floor and then setting a fire in its space.
Oh, and keep a backup of each fern somewhere safe.
cabin.quest.38D19F4EC634F33B.subtitle: Contraption 21
cabin.quest.38D19F4EC634F33B.title: The Spirit Cycle
cabin.quest.3934AD57122B6FFE.description: You'll find that the newly discovered Laser setup has other interesting capabilities.
Behind a bit of science and experimentation lies a way to transmute seemingly unrelated materials between another. The demanded Silicon element is one of them, but which is its counterpart?
After hitting the Checkmark above, the alternative fourth Chapter of the Factory Guide will become accessible from the Quest Sidebar. It will still be possible to return to the other chapter.
cabin.quest.3934AD57122B6FFE.subtitle: Alternative Path
cabin.quest.3934AD57122B6FFE.title: Chaotic Alchemy
cabin.quest.395978A711E14931.title: 1x Squid Beak
cabin.quest.397232F676CB621B.description: Working towards a passive supply of Radiant Induction Coils, you'll be sure to encounter some new and unfamiliar tasks.
Once again it's time to grab the Wrench, re-stock the toolbox and to clear out a new plot.
cabin.quest.397232F676CB621B.title: Chapter 3 Start!
cabin.quest.39D56A2B01DBD865.subtitle: 30 Silver
cabin.quest.39D56A2B01DBD865.title: Ore Collection
cabin.quest.3A48FDC224D029BF.description: Sell &6Wood Logs&f with the Carpentry permit.
cabin.quest.3A48FDC224D029BF.title: Carpenter
cabin.quest.3A4A3B749FBDBEF1.title: 4x Niter
cabin.quest.3A63A48662F352CB.description: Congrats! Inductive Mechanisms will now be generated passively. This opens the door to new exciting technological and magical exploits!
Once you are happy with the Assembly Line, head on back to the overview. There will be new options to explore.
cabin.quest.3A63A48662F352CB.title: Chapter 3 Complete!
cabin.quest.3A7A2C8D56500426.title: 16x Seared Stone
cabin.quest.3A81BC460AF1756D.title: Milling
cabin.quest.3A86EA1C2AD21C29.title: 8x Bamboo
cabin.quest.3AD7553F3C8593F9.description: Used to fill your spacesuit with oxygen.
cabin.quest.3AD7553F3C8593F9.subtitle: Contraption 48
cabin.quest.3AD7553F3C8593F9.title: Electrolysis
cabin.quest.3B421C8F7947E542.description: Crushing Dyed Singularities has a chance to yield little orbs of red colour.
Since this is not the colour needed for chromatic compound, you can use Item Drains for frequency correction.
cabin.quest.3B421C8F7947E542.title: Spectral Correction (Red)
cabin.quest.3B431AAADE8845FA.description: Now that you have a passive supply of Silicon Reagent, you may head over to the main section of Chapter 4. You will have opened up an entry point near the end of its recipe chain.
cabin.quest.3B431AAADE8845FA.title: Warp Zone
cabin.quest.3B548F2C060C2229.description: This Trading card can convert the currency of coins inserted into the Trading Machine.
cabin.quest.3B548F2C060C2229.subtitle: Silver <> Gold
cabin.quest.3B548F2C060C2229.title: Automatic Exchange
cabin.quest.3BE15AA5C237AB80.description: Magenta Paint Balls contain the essence needed for production of Chromatic Compound. Some will come directly from the crushed singularity, but the majority can be obtained by spectral correction on the other colours.
cabin.quest.3BE15AA5C237AB80.subtitle: Contraption 26-2
cabin.quest.3BE15AA5C237AB80.title: Spectral Correction (Magenta)
cabin.quest.3BFC4DFCE765F3EA.description: Set aside some Ender dust from your Reactor. In case your supply is bottlenecked, you can use Ender Pearls, too.
cabin.quest.3BFC4DFCE765F3EA.title: Ender for Garnish
cabin.quest.3C45250D863E65CB.title: 1x Cobweb
cabin.quest.3C50B4556375178E.description: Dropping the Liquids onto a Precision Mechanism will convert it to its Infernal counterpart.
Once again, full automation of bonus mechanisms is not as pressing a task, since they do not lead to any further machines beyond their own.
A semi-automatic setup for converting Precision Mechanisms whenever needed should suffice.
cabin.quest.3C50B4556375178E.subtitle: Contraption 18-2
cabin.quest.3C50B4556375178E.title: Heated Treatment
cabin.quest.3C79A7679BA1AA3C.title: 8x Pink Petals
cabin.quest.3CA6DD7C5516A330.title: 4x Reed
cabin.quest.3CBED6B591BCEDEA.description: Rocketry Equipment is built from the light but robust material of Matter Plastics. Matter Balls can be created in a Matter Condenser.

First, insert a 1k ME Storage Component into the Matter Condenser, set it to produce Matter Balls and then supply it with the most abundant flow of items you can come up with. Don't throw your valuables in; the items are consumed in the process.
cabin.quest.3CBED6B591BCEDEA.subtitle: Contraption 47
cabin.quest.3CBED6B591BCEDEA.title: Upcycle Bin
cabin.quest.3CD739455666E2A8.title: 8x Glow Berry
cabin.quest.3CEC6538990D89C3.title: 1x Blaze Cake
cabin.quest.3D1EEB596FDBE4E7.description: Route the excess leaves into a crusher, in preparation for the upcoming magic trick.
cabin.quest.3D1EEB596FDBE4E7.subtitle: Contraption 22-1
cabin.quest.3D1EEB596FDBE4E7.title: Mysterious Biomass
cabin.quest.3D7AD3AF3857F7D9.title: 32x Plating Block
cabin.quest.3E27961386364EDF.title: 4x Spanish Moss
cabin.quest.3EB5CD9776DF0E63.description: If this is Unlocked, you have gathered all reagents of the Igneous Category.
The Igneous Catalyst can be created by a combination of four reagents of this Category in the Alchemical Laser. &7(See the Catalyst's JEI entry for more information)
It's recommended to always take notes of previous results. This way it is not uncommon to find the solution in under six attempts!
cabin.quest.3EF5F89DBD6959E3.description: Gather the resin via a network of Fluid Pipes and use a Basin-Press to solidify it.
cabin.quest.3EF5F89DBD6959E3.subtitle: Contraption 9-2
cabin.quest.3EF5F89DBD6959E3.title: Rubber Stamper
cabin.quest.3F00084D9474C381.title: Traders' Finest
cabin.quest.3F2FB159F1B8875F.title: Plentiful Crops Collection
cabin.quest.3F45DFEF31838A00.description: Congrats! Now you have a passive supply of Kinetic Mechanisms. This is bound to change the pace a bit.
Before moving on, check back through your factory and search for any major bottlenecks.
It'd be a shame if a really efficient andesite generator is held back only by the sand not coming in quickly enough.
cabin.quest.3F45DFEF31838A00.title: Chapter 1 Complete!
cabin.quest.3FC1029AF9BB245E.title: 8x Lead Ingot
cabin.quest.400CDC316DCDFE88.description: A completely different age of Technology. Some machines are suddenly powered by some hardly observable magical energy.
The Launch feels very close now. While there still lie challenges ahead, the solution footprint will shrink again thanks to the new Appliances.
cabin.quest.400CDC316DCDFE88.title: Invar Machinery
cabin.quest.402F89CABF6BCDA4.description: Transmuting the blue reactive blend requires very special heating conditions, only available on Campfires or Stoves.
cabin.quest.402F89CABF6BCDA4.subtitle: Contraption 22-4
cabin.quest.402F89CABF6BCDA4.title: Cooking up some Fertiliser
cabin.quest.4064D448404CD639.description: Then cool it down to form obsidian.
cabin.quest.4064D448404CD639.subtitle: Contraption 10-3
cabin.quest.4064D448404CD639.title: Curing by Quenching
cabin.quest.407236D2B1D2257D.description: The sandbox has been turned upside down - be ready to invent your best Create Contraptions yet.
&7(Or the first, if you are that brave!)
cabin.quest.407236D2B1D2257D.title: I
cabin.quest.409A50CBCDBBA1F0.subtitle: 1 to 3, Byproducts
cabin.quest.409A50CBCDBBA1F0.title: Foundry Melting
cabin.quest.410FF28B63E0FC0C.description: The main work is done. All that's left is a small assembly line to process Refined Radiance into Radiant Coils.
cabin.quest.410FF28B63E0FC0C.subtitle: Contraption 28-2
cabin.quest.410FF28B63E0FC0C.title: Post-Process
cabin.quest.41709386017FD959.title: 16x Scoria
cabin.quest.417DD17A5C96CEE2.title: 8x Gold Ingot
cabin.quest.41BB50843EF5EF10.title: Sapling Collection
cabin.quest.4202EDD798183934.title: 32x Sunmetal
cabin.quest.42384DE39AA48976.title: Gardener's Starter Pack
cabin.quest.42A7073F3681626C.description: Rumors say that this map leads to a chamber used by an ancient civilization to train their strongest fighters. This place is bound to contain priceless weapons, metals, and artifacts.
(Unlike Vanilla, trial vaults can be re-opened every 30 minutes)
cabin.quest.42A7073F3681626C.title: Trial Tracker
cabin.quest.42B5C0102B22F389.description: 3-2, 4/4, 8-7,...? A total of 21 options exist to calculate ones. Whichever will it be?
cabin.quest.42B5C0102B22F389.subtitle: Contraption 44-1
cabin.quest.42B615F7BECA6E58.description: Aside from the Alchemical Laser setup, you'll need a few other Machines for your new Alchemy Lab.
- The Fluid Encapsulator uses Molten Glass to create Reagents from resources.
- The Reagent Extractor can reverse this process.
- The Centrifugal Separator is required to analyse alchemical blends for clues. A vital routine when researching the recipe of Catalysts.
cabin.quest.42B615F7BECA6E58.title: Encapsulate - Decapsulate
cabin.quest.42F1A649D86DB86D.description: First, the raw blocks are washed and refined into small orbs of wet sand.
Since they could easily collapse, they should never be stacked on top of another. The inductive Fluid Encapsulator should have the necessary precision to generate these reliably.
cabin.quest.42F1A649D86DB86D.subtitle: Contraption 31-2
cabin.quest.42F1A649D86DB86D.title: Ball o' Sand
cabin.quest.42F951B44FB2BFE3.title: 4x Leather
cabin.quest.433E103CD81712C1.title: 4x Bone
cabin.quest.436DA1A1AB8C0734.description: A friendly Record Collector is interested in any discs you find on your travels.
cabin.quest.436DA1A1AB8C0734.title: The lost Tapes
cabin.quest.43FC566E833BE834.description: Buy this relic to minimise the Tool Maintenance in the assembly of &6Inductive Mechanisms&r.
cabin.quest.43FC566E833BE834.title: Magnetic Energetic
cabin.quest.4412F3B2827606E4.description: Sifting for Coarse Sand creates a byproduct relevant for further refining the silicon compound.
cabin.quest.4412F3B2827606E4.title: Liquid Sand
cabin.quest.44540B11F341AE09.description: Dropping the Liquids onto a Precision Mechanism will convert it to its Logistic counterpart.
cabin.quest.44540B11F341AE09.subtitle: Contraption 20-2
cabin.quest.44540B11F341AE09.title: Brewing a plan
cabin.quest.44CDD45033A93614.title: 16x Brass Sheet Metal
cabin.quest.45E7810E21F6F9AE.description: Sometimes it is desirable to travel to a specific Biome. The Nature's Compass can at least point you in the right direction.
cabin.quest.46820FBDDDEE491E.description: It'll be good to order a Wood supply to this location. Aside from Silicon it can contribute to this assembly line for some other useful products.
cabin.quest.46820FBDDDEE491E.subtitle: Contraption 34-1
cabin.quest.46820FBDDDEE491E.title: Wood Delivery
cabin.quest.46F150CC9BE2D856.title: 1x Ender Pearl
cabin.quest.472FB03D0E5A38D6.description: A few of the following contraptions involve dropping items on the ground. Whenever a process will not backstack on overflow (e.g. belt items waiting automatically), it is important to toggle the production at certain buffer thresholds.
More concretely: When the output buffer exceeds 75%, stop producing items. Once it reaches below 25%, start the process up again. This prevents overflow and machines from spewing items everywhere.
The Stockpile Switch is designed for this purpose exactly.
cabin.quest.472FB03D0E5A38D6.title: Keeping Stock
cabin.quest.4732465116D723EE.description: Compact enough powder back together to create the highly reactive Ice Charge.
cabin.quest.4732465116D723EE.subtitle: Contraption 39-2
cabin.quest.4732465116D723EE.title: Concentrated Cold
cabin.quest.4761DAE59CDD93AF.description: For powering our Rocket, we will require some very potent fuel. Search some of the warmer biomes or the oceans for crude oil to get started.
If having no luck finding crude oil, perhaps there could be another way to get the heavy oil you need...
cabin.quest.4761DAE59CDD93AF.title: Black Gold
cabin.quest.4764EAB921EE1F19.title: 1x Catalyzing Gland
cabin.quest.47965C310D9847DC.description: It's finally time to put it all together.
Take a minute to craft a flag representing your space program to bring to the moon. You can apply patterns to it just like a Banner.
In your own time, take a seat in your assembled rocket, and press Space.
cabin.quest.47965C310D9847DC.title: We Have Lift Off!
cabin.quest.47FB0491BAB19B90.title: 16x Limestone
cabin.quest.4800892E1E70648D.description: The Launch Pad for your Rocket requires special surface materials.
cabin.quest.4800892E1E70648D.subtitle: Contraption 49
cabin.quest.4800892E1E70648D.title: Launch Pad Structure
cabin.quest.4864E6BA6AE2B49B.title: 1x Witch Hat
cabin.quest.488A4B4A3295CF10.title: 6x Cured Rubber
cabin.quest.48F72CFAB336FE73.title: 8x Certus Quartz
cabin.quest.49634E835B948A4F.title: 16x Scaffolding
cabin.quest.4A16CE3BC111280F.description: 9-2, 4+3, 8-1,...? A total of 14 options exist to calculate sevens. Feeling Lucky?
cabin.quest.4A16CE3BC111280F.subtitle: Contraption 44-6
cabin.quest.4A678C0BE97177DB.title: 8x Fluix Quartz
cabin.quest.4B01606CE7AF3121.description: Early on, it might help to import some dirt for base building.
cabin.quest.4B01606CE7AF3121.title: Landfill Pickup
cabin.quest.4B1017D1C176412F.description: Exactly what the name implies, its a stonecutter that you can use in your backpack.
cabin.quest.4B19B6EAD511378D.description: Separate the Silicon from its jar using a Reagent Extractor.
cabin.quest.4B19B6EAD511378D.subtitle: Contraption 39-A
cabin.quest.4B19B6EAD511378D.title: Unboxing
cabin.quest.4B34B52092BA32BE.description: New Invar Technology makes forming snowballs out of Water quite a simple process. Perhaps we should set aside a few for our next unannounced visitor..
cabin.quest.4B34B52092BA32BE.subtitle: Contraption 37
cabin.quest.4B34B52092BA32BE.title: Snowball Machine
cabin.quest.4B52A04818075900.description: As seen on TV: This Magical Bell can detect unlit areas around it. Free shipping, bonus cursed campfire. What a Deal!
cabin.quest.4B52A04818075900.title: Where mob ?
cabin.quest.4B80A801A5BE4A01.description: The next target will be Printed Silicon. As one of two known ways to obtain it, the assembly line will move items, fluids and energy in and out of the new and rather compact Invar Machinery.
Much like previous chapters, a few new material sources or shipments are required first.
cabin.quest.4B80A801A5BE4A01.title: Chapter 4 Start!
cabin.quest.4B891E9ED8DE6BB2.description: Glow Berries have a couple of ways to be automated, so pick whichever suits you best.
cabin.quest.4B891E9ED8DE6BB2.subtitle: Contraption 19-2
cabin.quest.4B891E9ED8DE6BB2.title: Suger and Spice II
cabin.quest.4BAC95CCC72369AD.description: True IT experts tend to avoid going outside much. Thankfully the necessary computer parts can now be delivered directly to their inventory!
cabin.quest.4BAC95CCC72369AD.subtitle: 6 Gold
cabin.quest.4BAC95CCC72369AD.title: Press Express
cabin.quest.4BD2016AFC2A2035.title: 1x Withered Rib
cabin.quest.4C068341DD17068B.title: 8x Kelp
cabin.quest.4C0F811C1D2495CC.title: 16x Sand
cabin.quest.4CC420A6B673176A.description: A good way to automate Sand at this moment is to build Strainers.
cabin.quest.4CC420A6B673176A.subtitle: Contraption 2
cabin.quest.4CC420A6B673176A.title: Catching Sediment
cabin.quest.4D07666ECE75D9B5.title: Crops Collection
cabin.quest.4D8972AE5B614FB3.description: Then, blast the deepslate to extreme temperatures, partially liquifying it.
cabin.quest.4D8972AE5B614FB3.subtitle: Contraption 10-2
cabin.quest.4D8972AE5B614FB3.title: Heating up
cabin.quest.4DFE4FD3B504AF4B.description: Getting to the Brass Age is hard work!
The avid salesman can come here for purchasing Trading Machines from the get go. This should help you take off!
cabin.quest.4DFE4FD3B504AF4B.title: Early Shipping
cabin.quest.4E85C8A2EEEB57C3.description: Without the operators, a data center would not be able to combine digits into others. Provide your Calculators with an automated supply of any operator they end up requiring.
cabin.quest.4E85C8A2EEEB57C3.subtitle: Contraption 43-2
cabin.quest.4E85C8A2EEEB57C3.title: Operators
cabin.quest.4EDD9A8F14E48EAE.description: Marvellous! The power of instant transportation is in your hands at last. Surely there are some places in your factory where this could really speed things up.
cabin.quest.4EDD9A8F14E48EAE.title: Bonus 3A Complete!
cabin.quest.4F7A70041B67A348.description: The Dream of walking the Moon's surface finally came to fruition.
With that, the role of this Factory Guide has been fulfilled. Enjoy building up your new Hi-Tech Empire, and we'll see you in the next modpack!
cabin.quest.4F7A70041B67A348.title: ...to a Spacefarer
cabin.quest.4F953BACF4D1C151.description: Buy this relic to minimise the Tool Maintenance in the assembly of &6Kinetic Mechanisms&r.
cabin.quest.4F953BACF4D1C151.subtitle: 5 Gold
cabin.quest.4F953BACF4D1C151.title: Saw everything
cabin.quest.4F95D5136E944ADB.description: You can just keep on pulverising it. Sky Stone blocks never seem to lose mass in the process. What a world we live in!
Find Sky Stone Blocks at Meteor crash sites. If you haven't encountered any, try looking for one using the Meteorite compass.
cabin.quest.4F95D5136E944ADB.subtitle: Contraption 11
cabin.quest.4F95D5136E944ADB.title: Skystone Infini-mill
cabin.quest.4FD46F841CCD59F8.description: It's like a shulker but classy, wearable, and upgradeable!
cabin.quest.4FD46F841CCD59F8.title: Backpack
cabin.quest.50E2D6459F3D68C0.description: In case you need large universal storage space in a block, check out the upgrade options for wooden barrels.
cabin.quest.50E2D6459F3D68C0.title: Big Barrels
cabin.quest.5200AD3B32D219C6.description: If this is Unlocked, you have gathered all reagents of the Gemstone Category.
The Gemstone Catalyst can be created by a combination of four reagents of this Category in the Alchemical Laser. &7(See the Catalyst's JEI entry for more information)
cabin.quest.522D9970B8C43046.title: 4x Slime Ball
cabin.quest.52C7EF47A0423CAB.title: 16x Cherry Log
cabin.quest.52CCFCE2733F76BC.title: 4x Gunpowder
cabin.quest.5326F6482C45D22A.description: Here you can exchange a Gold Coin back to a Stack of Silver.
cabin.quest.5326F6482C45D22A.subtitle: Gold -> Silver
cabin.quest.532EFE32C3A515B5.description: Upwards-facing Mechanical Saws can process the harvested logs further...
cabin.quest.532EFE32C3A515B5.subtitle: Contraption 7-1
cabin.quest.532EFE32C3A515B5.title: Log Stripper
cabin.quest.5351AF6CA73CB8E0.description: Spout a droplet of Molten Iron onto the Rose Quartz Crystal to create a fully functional Electron Tube.
cabin.quest.5351AF6CA73CB8E0.subtitle: Contraption 15-5
cabin.quest.5351AF6CA73CB8E0.title: Second Coating Layer
cabin.quest.5358E5F7FB59DD60.description: 3-1, 8/4, 1+1,...? A total of 17 options exist to calculate twos. Any favourites?
cabin.quest.5358E5F7FB59DD60.subtitle: Contraption 44-2
cabin.quest.53735DC4231AB566.description: Washing the Gravel with an Encased Fan leaves you with Iron Nuggets and Flint.
cabin.quest.53735DC4231AB566.subtitle: Contraption 15-3
cabin.quest.53735DC4231AB566.title: Ferric Traces
cabin.quest.53A0ED15395EE1C9.subtitle: 8x Silver
cabin.quest.53A0ED15395EE1C9.title: 1x Bitumen
cabin.quest.5491C5600D7F039A.title: 1x Bat Wing
cabin.quest.549D7F67A97CD2CE.description: If this is Unlocked, you have gathered all reagents of the Crystalline Category.
The Crystalline Catalyst can be created by a combination of four reagents of this Category in the Alchemical Laser. &7(See the Catalyst's JEI entry for more information)
cabin.quest.5504C6597C74637B.title: 16x Oak Log
cabin.quest.5550A3E383EFEC90.description: As one of the two available digits, Threes can be cast from unprocessed logic. Together with the Eight and available Operators, your Calculators will have to create the remaining digits from 0 to 9 in equal amounts.
This casting process can quickly become a bottleneck, for most running calculations depend on the numbers generated here. Make sure things move fluently.
cabin.quest.5550A3E383EFEC90.subtitle: Contraption 43-1
cabin.quest.55F959A18E904D6C.description: 6-2, 2x2, 3+1,...? A total of 16 options exist to calculate fours. Choose wisely.
cabin.quest.55F959A18E904D6C.subtitle: Contraption 44-3
cabin.quest.562696C1D01B2685.title: The Ranch
cabin.quest.566E72AE7D580917.description: Your coins seem to have a corresponding Reagent, too. Though do not expect to be able to mint new currency out of your silver ingots.
cabin.quest.576E0B50F2015C9E.title: 4x Watergrass
cabin.quest.5799B4124EE20DB1.description: Before it is ready for processing, the basalz essence needs a bit of refinement.
cabin.quest.5799B4124EE20DB1.subtitle: Contraption 33-1
cabin.quest.5799B4124EE20DB1.title: Basalz Mill
cabin.quest.5799D55BB26BA52C.description: These Quests are an Automation Plan for your upcoming Assembly Line. Always view them as recommendations on what you should construct a passive supply for. The flowgraph depicts the connections between relevant recipes/processing.
cabin.quest.5799D55BB26BA52C.title: Chapter 1 Start!
cabin.quest.57CD030DE2CD7715.title: 4x Vines
cabin.quest.585788A4494AC124.title: 16x Dark Oak Log
cabin.quest.58B534C4AEB4139D.description: In order for the basalz essence to form, the FluxoMagnet present in the cart has to be charged.
Therefore, the contraption will have to route the magnets from the cart unloader through an Energetic Infuser before passing it back into the circuit.
cabin.quest.58B534C4AEB4139D.subtitle: Contraption 32-3
cabin.quest.58B534C4AEB4139D.title: Flux Charger
cabin.quest.58E38BA6D927409F.description: Fund the operation with coin provided either from various errands, or your chosen professions.
Automatically ship produce from your farms or gather other players to aid you in your mission.
Then you can purchase all manner of resources, artifacts and building blocks from the market, making your life just a little bit easier.
cabin.quest.58E38BA6D927409F.title: IV
cabin.quest.58E93229D6552D4B.title: 1x Sponge
cabin.quest.5923347D1827DA83.title: 16x Spruce Log
cabin.quest.59474208A27099BF.title: 1x Molten Core
cabin.quest.59B17CA4AA6D0DD4.description: Taking on a &6Profession&r gives you access to a more consistent source of income.
The Profession Cards bought here act as a "Permit". All they do is unlock the respective recipes in the Trading Machine. You can absolutely have multiple of these.
cabin.quest.59B17CA4AA6D0DD4.title: Professions
cabin.quest.59D2104DB6AE93FD.description: It'll be good to stock up on a couple of resonators for the Mechanism Assembly.
Don't worry about automating them fully, though.
cabin.quest.59D2104DB6AE93FD.title: Arming the Deployer III
cabin.quest.59E4A6163753BC12.description: ...and further, into the perfect base for our first Mechanism.
Note: before the machine starts showering you with random furniture, place a wooden slab in the filter slot of the Mechanical Saw.
cabin.quest.59E4A6163753BC12.subtitle: Contraption 7-3
cabin.quest.59E4A6163753BC12.title: Cutter of Cut Planks
cabin.quest.59EBD3DADD002D3A.title: 32x Straw
cabin.quest.5A055D0421861318.description: It'll be good to stock up on a couple of saws for the Mechanism Assembly.
However, they are not nearly consumed as quickly as something that would require an automated supply.
cabin.quest.5A055D0421861318.title: Arming the Deployer
cabin.quest.5A199B898D41A309.description: Here comes the central feature of this Factory Wing: the Reactor.

Progressing towards Inductive Coils requires a controlled Explosion where nearby Singularities and Ender Dust are combined. See if you can come up with a circuit to continuously blow up these dropped item-stacks.

Note: Ender dust and Singularities are consumed in a 1:1 ratio. They do not have to be in the exact same location. One TNT can transform multiple sets of ingredients. The result will drop at the location of the Singularity item.
cabin.quest.5A199B898D41A309.subtitle: Contraption 24
cabin.quest.5A199B898D41A309.title: The Reactor
cabin.quest.5B0727505DC791DF.description: You saw the numbers required to create a space station, and you took it as a challenge.
With perseverance (or just waiting), you managed to gather the resources to create one.
At this point, you might as well decorate it, and post it on the discord, as there is nothing left to do.
cabin.quest.5B0727505DC791DF.subtitle: The only truly hidden quest.
cabin.quest.5B0727505DC791DF.title: Going The Extra Mile
cabin.quest.5BB058D52AA40751.title: 4x Sugar Cane
cabin.quest.5C277D27606F64DA.description: The trusty and cheap multi-purpose material of cobblestone is making its comeback.
cabin.quest.5C277D27606F64DA.title: More Cobblestone
cabin.quest.5C4F6E63B02A25F0.description: Having a magma block be present when creating a stone block via water and lava causes an odd reaction where deepslate is formed instead.
Like with the andesite generator, drills should be used to harvest the deepslate, which will then need to be resmelted.
cabin.quest.5C4F6E63B02A25F0.subtitle: Contraption 10-1
cabin.quest.5C4F6E63B02A25F0.title: Deep Below
cabin.quest.5D0454F977C4F080.description: Welcome to the final Chapter of this Journey: building the Data Centre. What will this entail? Thousands of numeric calculations!
But do not fear, as an inventor you will let your creation do all the work for you, as usual.

Cast the combined logic of all your Calculation Mechanisms into two digits, from which you will calculate 8 others through a series of crafting operations. A digital ME system is recommended for managing the logistics, though not strictly required.
cabin.quest.5D0454F977C4F080.title: Finale Start!
cabin.quest.5D17CB247942013A.description: Your last resort in case the sundown beat you to it.
cabin.quest.5D17CB247942013A.title: Sleepless
cabin.quest.5D4F2FFCBD0B0F8E.title: 1x Obsidian
cabin.quest.5D6C7D1C371A4D6E.title: 1x Moss Block
cabin.quest.5DCF9C8212AA3BE3.description: For the first time in the progression, a Blaze Burner is required. Obtain them by using Empty Blaze Burners on Blazes or their Spawners.
cabin.quest.5DCF9C8212AA3BE3.title: Blaze Escort
cabin.quest.5E62059675895213.description: The entire factory is started back up for one final sprint. With a steady supply of Calculation Mechanisms, the Digital Infrastucture performs the necessary operations to put together an ideal Trajectory.
While this Data Center visibly crunches the numbers, the designated Astronaut starts getting themselves and the spaceship prepared for launch.
cabin.quest.5E62059675895213.subtitle: Finale
cabin.quest.5E62059675895213.title: Divide by Digital
cabin.quest.5F0B4CBE299954C4.title: 16x Diorite
cabin.quest.5F32791B5284E321.title: 4x Big Dripleaf
cabin.quest.5F9BA7BA46D2E5B8.description: Sand will be required to build the Explosives needed for the Reactor. Thankfully, new standards have allowed you access to Crushing Wheels, which make sand production a lot less of a nuisance.
cabin.quest.5F9BA7BA46D2E5B8.subtitle: Contraption 23-1
cabin.quest.5F9BA7BA46D2E5B8.title: More Sand
cabin.quest.5FCCD2F720115D41.subtitle: 1 to 9-27, Byproducts
cabin.quest.5FCCD2F720115D41.title: Induction Smelting
cabin.quest.608BF7BE3CB666F3.description: Kelp is vital ingredient to our first Assembly Line target: Andesite Alloy.
Kelp can be gathered automatically with Mechanical Harvesters.
cabin.quest.608BF7BE3CB666F3.subtitle: Contraption 3
cabin.quest.608BF7BE3CB666F3.title: Underwater Garden
cabin.quest.60A8B4C736CE3226.description: Compact enough powder back together to create the highly reactive Earth Charge.
cabin.quest.60A8B4C736CE3226.subtitle: Contraption 33-2
cabin.quest.60A8B4C736CE3226.title: Concentrated Heat
cabin.quest.61147823CC87F711.description: The earliest inventions reveal ones resourcefulness with low level equipment: Auto-Crafting? None. Filtering? Not cheap! Item Transport? May the Belt Spaghetti mesh in your favour.
After hitting the Checkmark above, the first Chapter of the Factory Guide will become accessible from the Quest Sidebar.
cabin.quest.61147823CC87F711.subtitle: Chapter 1
cabin.quest.61147823CC87F711.title: High Aspirations
cabin.quest.612100C7C6E0A7C9.title: I: Crushed
cabin.quest.619E34A7DE48B991.description: Discharging an Energized Certus Quartz Crystal into the liquid creates a solution that reminds you of liquid redstone.
Notice that the mixing process returns an inert quartz ready to be recharged using Contraption 14.
cabin.quest.619E34A7DE48B991.subtitle: Contraption 13-2
cabin.quest.619E34A7DE48B991.title: Charged Mixer
cabin.quest.61B040CD0832EFC0.title: Painter's Starter Kit
cabin.quest.623EE1E0678E4F2A.subtitle: 1 to 6
cabin.quest.623EE1E0678E4F2A.title: Pulverizing
cabin.quest.626A7D9947D82B89.description: And finally, one last Crafter to cut and wind up the radiant sheet into an Induction Coil.
cabin.quest.626A7D9947D82B89.subtitle: Contraption 28-3
cabin.quest.626A7D9947D82B89.title: Neon lights
cabin.quest.62EB94758A862091.description: If this is Unlocked, you have gathered all reagents of the Volatile Category.
The Volatile Catalyst can be created by a combination of four reagents of this Category in the Alchemical Laser. &7(See the Catalyst's JEI entry for more information)
cabin.quest.630DA0C83959E9D8.description: With the transmutation recipe in hand, it is time to build a facility able to create an infinite amount of Silicon Reagent via Laser Alchemy and the other steps part of the process.

Note that the concete solution depends highly on the transmutation pairings of your World, which is why it cannot be laid out in this Guide. You can use JEI to find other necessary recipes leading up to the reagent you require.
cabin.quest.630DA0C83959E9D8.subtitle: Contraption 31-A
cabin.quest.630DA0C83959E9D8.title: Automatic Chaos
cabin.quest.6509024553997AB0.subtitle: [in Nuggets]
cabin.quest.6509024553997AB0.title: IIIb: Liquid
cabin.quest.6545C3F427B12106.description: From here it's really no hassle to do things manually. If you must, you can always come back to make an assembly line later on.
cabin.quest.6545C3F427B12106.title: All Sealed Up
cabin.quest.661807F8ED723EEB.description: These nice backpacks can be upgraded to increase storage space, as well as augmented to change how they act, such as a autosmelter, or increasing the stacksize of items stored within.
You can even get one of these in the store, so it may be worth spending your early coins on to make the earlygame mining trip go by much quicker.
cabin.quest.662583DB97721FE8.title: 1x Guardian Spike
cabin.quest.667F4F686A45EF3E.description: Congrats! Now you have a good supply of Reinforced Mechanisms and Train Hulls. You can use these to get a train network going, able to travel long distances and across dimensions automatically.
Steam and Rails adds a bunch of extra rail options, for those wanting to beautify their rails.
cabin.quest.667F4F686A45EF3E.title: Bonus 1B Complete!
cabin.quest.669D57A1E1B09CD8.title: Plentiful Mineral Collection
cabin.quest.66DA9BE9277FABF1.description: Sell &6Prepared Food&f with the Cooking permit.
cabin.quest.66DA9BE9277FABF1.title: Chef
cabin.quest.66DDDE912A191E57.description: Sell all manner of &6Monster Loot&f with the Hunting permit.
cabin.quest.66DDDE912A191E57.title: Hunter
cabin.quest.675C395B2074C24C.description: Bringing together Andesite Alloy and cut planks using a row of Deployers concludes your first Assembly Line, removing the need for gears to craft Kenetic Mechanisms.
On the topic of gears, you can rightclick a gear with a plank and it will match its texture, just like waterwheels.
cabin.quest.675C395B2074C24C.subtitle: Contraption 8
cabin.quest.675C395B2074C24C.title: Deploy, Deploy, Deploy.
cabin.quest.67B45D6767F8BFD9.title: 1x Slime Pearl
cabin.quest.6824055533465010.description: For one last time, a line of Deployers will be needed to upgrade the previous mechanism to the next tier.
cabin.quest.6824055533465010.subtitle: Contraption 40-2
cabin.quest.6824055533465010.title: Ready to Deploy
cabin.quest.683AA93BE7DEA512.description: Sell mass-produced &6Building Blocks&f for a profit with the Masonry permit.
cabin.quest.683AA93BE7DEA512.title: Mason
cabin.quest.685DD2A4DFF56193.title: 1x Blaze Rod
cabin.quest.6892AE55581393C6.description: The rigid flowgraph of this guide may suggest that items aren't accessible until they have been automated.
Be reassured that you already have access to tools from later ages, such as filtering- though not without a bit of manual effort.
cabin.quest.6892AE55581393C6.title: Speedrun
cabin.quest.68DF462185A9AF63.description: Lead Machines unlock high automation, letting you do everything from setting up restocking storage systems to selling items to other players, and everything in between with the power of packages.
Note that Logistic Mechanisms are an ingredient to nothing else. The main assembly line will continue with Precision Mechanisms.
cabin.quest.68DF462185A9AF63.title: Lead Machinery
cabin.quest.69275ECFC147E15B.description: With Precision Mechanisms automated, a large number of great tools become accessible. Both for automation and quality of life.
It also opens the gate leading towards the Invar Age- potentially after a quick stop by the bonus section..
cabin.quest.69275ECFC147E15B.title: Brass Machinery
cabin.quest.69311E02A8B3451D.description: For the calculations of the Guidance computer, we will need.. a lot of these Digits.
Before letting items exit the logistical ecosystem of the calculations, make sure each digit leaves in equal amounts. Brass Tunnels can solve this issue in a straight-forward fashion.

Each digit now has to be dissolved back into its liquified form via Smeltery. Once a Smeltery collected 10 liquified items of each digit, they combine into the encoded logic required for our Computer. Once enough of this figurative alloy has accumulated, it can be cast into the powerful Computation Matrix.
The Navigation Computer requires 8 Matrices to function. Depending on your data centre and mechanism assembly lines, this may take a while.
cabin.quest.69311E02A8B3451D.subtitle: Contraption 45
cabin.quest.69311E02A8B3451D.title: Solving Trajectories
cabin.quest.69B107895D3CA0B2.title: 8x Zinc Ingot
cabin.quest.69D55492A8F42A94.description: The Questing system helps you with the primary customisations of the Modpack: &3Trades&r and the &6Progression of Tech&r
Completing Quests is not required to progress through the game.
cabin.quest.69D55492A8F42A94.title: Completely Optional
cabin.quest.6A156D11D983661D.description: Create bars of Matter Plastics in a Super-Heated Compacter. You'll need a couple of these.
cabin.quest.6A156D11D983661D.title: Expensive Bricks II
cabin.quest.6A76E65324F0ACC0.title: Spectral Correction (Green)
cabin.quest.6AC1CED0D341150E.description: &6Shipments&r are the Automated way to exchange coin for resources. Here you can buy Import Cards for use in the Trading Machine.
Each import card comes with a cost up front. Once that is paid you can limitlessly buy the respective goods priced at what's stated in the subtitle.
cabin.quest.6AE7090EB52A51B3.title: 16x Gravel
cabin.quest.6B03056FA21424C0.description: A simple Overview of most options to process your way from Ore to Ingot.
For every path through this graph, the effective yield per ore can be estimated by multiplying the ratio of each included step.
cabin.quest.6B03056FA21424C0.title: Build-a-Processing:
cabin.quest.6B7F0631060A9E62.description: All your Andesite is likely not being generated near your factory. Figure out a way to bring it to the surface.
cabin.quest.6B7F0631060A9E62.subtitle: Contraption 5
cabin.quest.6B7F0631060A9E62.title: The Andesite Lift
cabin.quest.6BA9A176EDA001A3.description: If you intend to survive past the landing, a special set of armour will be required.
cabin.quest.6BA9A176EDA001A3.title: Attire
cabin.quest.6BC864CC7CB2C316.description: With the rise of Inductive Machinery, you'll want to have the option to connect dynamos and machines together in an energy grid.

You can use a Cresent Hammer to rightclick the pipe connection attached to the block in order to enable/disable the connection, and flux limiters can be used to edit the RF/t that can be exported out of a given connection.
cabin.quest.6BC864CC7CB2C316.title: Induction Conduits
cabin.quest.6BC9B96B2C6684DC.title: 1x Soul Lantern
cabin.quest.6C00F2935F27C2AD.title: Adopt an Axolotl
cabin.quest.6C029983EE2035A5.description: Logistic Mechanisms are all about efficiency and speed, and haste is a term that embodies that. To get started with brewing your own potions, you will need to brave a nether fortress and retrieve some nether wart to grow.
cabin.quest.6C029983EE2035A5.subtitle: Contraption 19-1
cabin.quest.6C029983EE2035A5.title: Sugar and Spice I
cabin.quest.6C0EC278451434AC.description: Sell &6Fish&f and Subterranean &6Treasure&f with the Fishing permit.
cabin.quest.6C0EC278451434AC.title: Fisherman
cabin.quest.6C4CB8F616A9C3DF.description: The first Alchemical Laser forms activated basalz essence from Basalt. This works only if a charged FluxoMagnet is present alongside it in the Hopper Cart.

A reliable way to automate the Laser is to use two Cart Loaders, one to place a magnet, one to fill the remaining slots with Basalt Blocks. Move the cart under the laser and activate it. From here you can use one Unloader to extract the worn magnet as well as the desired output.
cabin.quest.6C4CB8F616A9C3DF.subtitle: Contraption 32-2
cabin.quest.6C4CB8F616A9C3DF.title: Hot Laser
cabin.quest.6C6A43E08FBC8D53.title: 16x Acacia Log
cabin.quest.6C6C1C2E7CA882BD.title: 4x Clover Petal
cabin.quest.6CBA3D97CAD5DB63.description: You know the drill. It is time to upgrade your previously automated Precision Mechanisms to the next level!
cabin.quest.6CBA3D97CAD5DB63.subtitle: Contraption 29
cabin.quest.6CBA3D97CAD5DB63.title: Deploy the Payload
cabin.quest.6D1519B746E032FB.description: In order for the blizz essence to form, the Entropy Manipulator present in the cart has to be charged.
Ensure the charge in it is restored before its next use.
cabin.quest.6D1519B746E032FB.subtitle: Contraption 38-2
cabin.quest.6D1519B746E032FB.title: Entropy Charger
cabin.quest.6D26DAB7D0FF6E90.description: A central role in this age of technology is played by the Alchemical Laser.
It usually involves converting one material into another, using a high-energy beam and a catalyst or tool of some kind.
cabin.quest.6D7D2E63F1E35329.description: Lead Machines require the very essence of efficiency, something that can be done with some engineering!
After hitting the Checkmark above, additional Quests located in the Second Chapter will be revealed.
cabin.quest.6D7D2E63F1E35329.subtitle: Bonus 2B
cabin.quest.6D7D2E63F1E35329.title: Brewing Efficiency
cabin.quest.6D7D504E9DC22590.description: Exchangers make for a nice tool to replace blocks with others. Saves you a lot of digging.
cabin.quest.6D7D504E9DC22590.title: Hotswap replace
cabin.quest.6D8BB2D6A75ABB16.description: It'll be good to stock up on a couple of screwdrivers for the Mechanism Assembly.
Just like last time, the requirement does not necessarily call for automation.
cabin.quest.6D8BB2D6A75ABB16.title: Arming the Deployer II
cabin.quest.6D8E4C9DCFFB2C90.title: 8x Nickel Ingot
cabin.quest.6D900619B1967D72.description: These Blueprints can be given one or more crafting recipes, which they then apply to your held items whenever you right-click them.

The quickest and most effective way to assign recipes is to locate the recipe in JEI while the blueprint UI is open. Clicking the '+' in the JEI recipe view will transfer the recipe ingredients to the blueprint for you.
cabin.quest.6D900619B1967D72.title: Big Plans
cabin.quest.6D9F2FBEB7CC5195.title: 1-Up!
cabin.quest.6DBEF7A11890ADF8.description: And finally, upgrade some of your Inductive Mechanisms in the Smelter using the newly obtained Alloy.
cabin.quest.6DBEF7A11890ADF8.title: Enderium Infused
cabin.quest.6E3216E644289961.title: 16x Honeycomb Block
cabin.quest.6F750A66D0A559DE.description: To form Matter Plastics, we need temperatures unreachable by even the most overclocked Invar Machines. However, your little Blaze friend will be happy to trade...
cabin.quest.6F750A66D0A559DE.title: Treat for Heat
cabin.quest.6FDC8DA2FDED5FDD.description: Armed with the Chaos Catalyst, you will find all manner of transmutation pairs among the Reagents above.

Simply put the Chaos Catalyst and a few jars of one reagent (The transmutation is lossy) into the hopper cart and find a different reagent returned after activating the laser. Mind that the Catalyst is never consumed in the process.

One of the Reagents should lead not to another known one, but to the Reagent of Silicon. If this turns out to be one that is reasonably accessible, you can consider choosing this path of production over the main one.
cabin.quest.6FDC8DA2FDED5FDD.title: The Discovery
cabin.quest.6FF65841E3EA0FCD.title: 1x Eye of the Storm
cabin.quest.7061F42CF050ADCA.description: Human Arms just aren't evolved to build machines efficiently, yet. Thankfully this gadget can make up for it by increasing your reach distance significantly.
cabin.quest.7061F42CF050ADCA.title: Pass me the butter
cabin.quest.70B164A5F22452CA.title: 4x Cattail
cabin.quest.70D563EF30E9CB97.description: In order to provide 'Mechanical' Calculators with numbers and operators, all available Calculation Mechanisms have to be melted down into the figurative processing power they provide.
cabin.quest.70D563EF30E9CB97.subtitle: Contraption 42
cabin.quest.70D563EF30E9CB97.title: Processing Power
cabin.quest.70EBB5E32545ACEC.title: 16x Scorched Stone
cabin.quest.70FDB8C2F2C4A825.title: 16x Flint
cabin.quest.715BBD0DF0136FF1.title: Melting
cabin.quest.71D90A1E5D53FC0A.description: Use Deployers to create a circuit base out of silicon. The required Press can be located at the center of Sky Stone Meteors.
cabin.quest.71D90A1E5D53FC0A.subtitle: Contraption 40-1
cabin.quest.71D90A1E5D53FC0A.title: Circuit Stamper
cabin.quest.725FFE8BD6E45F96.title: 16x Warped Stem
cabin.quest.727B43FD95C4A512.description: The Automation Target this time is the Electron Tube. Placing them onto the Kinetic Mechanism will send you to the next tier.
cabin.quest.727B43FD95C4A512.title: Chapter 2 Start!
cabin.quest.729FB5DD07C234E8.description: With the help of Encased Fans, sand can be refined into clay.
cabin.quest.729FB5DD07C234E8.subtitle: Contraption 6-1
cabin.quest.729FB5DD07C234E8.title: Clay Washer
cabin.quest.72BE175C83834838.description: In the Mix! Clay and Kelp can be processed with the Mechanical Mixer.
cabin.quest.72BE175C83834838.subtitle: Contraption 6-2
cabin.quest.72BE175C83834838.title: Algae Blender
cabin.quest.72CACE8F0E4701B1.description: Buy this relic to minimise the Tool Maintenance in the assembly of &6Precision Mechanisms&r.
cabin.quest.72CACE8F0E4701B1.title: Never Screwed
cabin.quest.73473DC7269EC5B0.description: With the Launch Pad in place, it is time put it all together to construct your Spaceship.
cabin.quest.73473DC7269EC5B0.subtitle: Contraption &b50
cabin.quest.73473DC7269EC5B0.title: The Spaceship
cabin.quest.736FC31210F334F2.description: Write an application explaining why exactly your organisation is worth investing in.
cabin.quest.736FC31210F334F2.title: Government Funding
cabin.quest.737E670DC8AD5E19.subtitle: 9 Silver
cabin.quest.737E670DC8AD5E19.title: 4x Bramble
cabin.quest.73EEAE66CC2014E9.title: 1x Nebulous Heart
cabin.quest.73FCA432DEFC1DED.description: In another Mix! This time it'll be the bricks and your surfaced Andesite Cobblestone.
cabin.quest.73FCA432DEFC1DED.subtitle: Contraption 6-4
cabin.quest.73FCA432DEFC1DED.title: Algaesite Mixer
cabin.quest.746F9F4F21D8400D.title: Compacting by Drawer
cabin.quest.74F96A8D400FD059.title: 8x Copper Ingot
cabin.quest.7509D8FA29C6AB31.title: 4x Apatite
cabin.quest.75FB28B253B14876.description: Welcome to the Overview. You can always come back here to catch up on your current position in the Progression of Technology. If you look closely, your Journey to the Moon completes the final step of the way on the right side.
cabin.quest.75FB28B253B14876.title: From a Tree Puncher...
cabin.quest.76287BDB2E9B7BC8.title: 4x Rotten Flesh
cabin.quest.7664FBB32FCC6BE6.description: Trains can be used to transport materials and fluids across long distances and the nether, without the need for chunkloading.
After hitting the Checkmark above, additional Quests located in the First Chapter will be revealed.
cabin.quest.7664FBB32FCC6BE6.subtitle: Bonus 1B
cabin.quest.7664FBB32FCC6BE6.title: Quenching Deepslate
cabin.quest.76706BE282ABAC31.description: Same deal as it's sealed counterpart, you don't need to automate the rest of the steps.
cabin.quest.76706BE282ABAC31.title: Heavy Duty
cabin.quest.76E3B76D47A1F889.description: Defeat those intruders, and you'll have the support from nearby villages.
cabin.quest.76E3B76D47A1F889.title: Revenge
cabin.quest.7722ADDCAD9987BD.title: 8x Cobbled Deepslate
cabin.quest.780E8AE86250C73D.description: The Groundwork has been laid with all that has been created so far. The pace should really pick up from here.
Producing components for inductive technology relies on very peculiar techniques. Though with all the new equipment ready, automating even the more convoluted interactions should become a cakewalk.
After hitting the Checkmark above, the third Chapter of the Factory Guide will become accessible from the Quest Sidebar.
cabin.quest.780E8AE86250C73D.subtitle: Chapter 3
cabin.quest.780E8AE86250C73D.title: The Catharsis
cabin.quest.7888F9129E9FE517.description: Access to Zinc Machines will require for some engineering in another dimension. Even if it's literally Hell, a change of scene will always bring forth new ideas and inspiration.
cabin.quest.7888F9129E9FE517.subtitle: Bonus 2A
cabin.quest.7888F9129E9FE517.title: Magmatic Exploits
cabin.quest.78A8751AF86E0E32.description: Rechiseled adds a variety of block varients to give you more options when building your base.
If loaded, Rechiseled: Create adds even more blocks, as well as a way to automate the chiseling of all of the above, with the mechanical chisel.
cabin.quest.78A8751AF86E0E32.title: Chiseling
cabin.quest.78ECB6EB48347D08.title: 4x Cinnabar
cabin.quest.7927B6162577FA7B.description: 3+2, 6-1, 8-3,...? A total of 14 options exist to calculate fives. How do you want to do this?
cabin.quest.7927B6162577FA7B.subtitle: Contraption 44-4
cabin.quest.7932D19BE114264A.subtitle: 55 Silver
cabin.quest.7932D19BE114264A.title: Ancient Life
cabin.quest.794B3C10C6110CB5.description: After your flawless encounter with the Ender Dragon, make your way to the Gateway and travel to the outer Islands.
Here you should be able to find the Chorus Fruit necessary for creating Enderium Alloy.
cabin.quest.794B3C10C6110CB5.title: Gateway Expedition
cabin.quest.7967324CAC77AF60.title: Mining Tool
cabin.quest.7967324CAC77AF60.subtitle: 1 to 2-3
cabin.quest.7A9AA27029185035.description: If this is Unlocked, you have gathered Catalysts of every Category.
This Ultimate Catalyst is now a combination of four of the Catalysts, much in the way the Catalysts are found and made by their Reagents.
&7(See this item's JEI entry for more information)
cabin.quest.7A9AA27029185035.title: The Final Code
cabin.quest.7AAE71F57FB89BCC.description: Next up, we need Crushing Wheels. Not only as a machine, but as an ingredient, too.
Walls of Mechanical Crafters can quickly get in the way of paths and other infrastructure. Make sure to give them some space.
cabin.quest.7AAE71F57FB89BCC.title: The Wall
cabin.quest.7B080B5C87247EA1.description: Fire up your Induction Smelter for two rounds of processing:
First off, refine your Silver Ingots with Ender Dust and Chorous Fruit.
cabin.quest.7B080B5C87247EA1.title: Alien Alloys
cabin.quest.7B23C933D76458BA.description: Use Mechanical Crafters once more to refine the paint orbs into Chromatic Compound.
cabin.quest.7B23C933D76458BA.subtitle: Contraption 26-3
cabin.quest.7B23C933D76458BA.title: Colours Refined
cabin.quest.7B5B7BB304E14C6D.title: 16x Andesite Alloy
cabin.quest.7B7A161B4BAB89AD.title: 16x Industrial Iron Sheet Metal
cabin.quest.7BDF86B9E3E607C5.title: 1x Rice
cabin.quest.7BE0F4512FE4936D.description: Excellent! Now you can move into high automation and packaging with haste! These newfound tools will surely help you push forward.
cabin.quest.7BE0F4512FE4936D.title: Bonus 2B Complete!
cabin.quest.7C270AB26CD9AAB8.title: Hunt the Undead
cabin.quest.7C7B81ABFC586379.title: 4x Prismarine Crystals
cabin.quest.7D6BC99CCCB29924.description: Careful! Before you are ready to embark on the journey of automation, it can help to set up a basic workshop first.
Here are some recommendations for a successful start.
cabin.quest.7D6BC99CCCB29924.title: Preparations
cabin.quest.7D808F15BEDD7A7B.description: 3x3, 4+5, 8+1,...? A total of 15 options exist to calculate nines. The choice is yours.
cabin.quest.7D808F15BEDD7A7B.subtitle: Contraption 44-7
cabin.quest.7D872F933F45809B.description: While Copper Machines will definitely be required going forward; full automation of their ingredients is completely optional.
cabin.quest.7D872F933F45809B.subtitle: Bonus 1A
cabin.quest.7D872F933F45809B.title: Rubber Tycoon
cabin.quest.7D92D05B4A67FD78.title: Plentiful Igneous Sample Collection
cabin.quest.7D93DAB3E8ACF953.description: Various saplings prized for their unique leaves.
The traveler who traded us this set also threw in some bamboo, claiming that "an oriental build just doesn't work without it".
cabin.quest.7D93DAB3E8ACF953.title: Exotic Saplings
cabin.quest.7DFB9DD1A1BB63E4.title: 16x Clear Glass
cabin.quest.7E59B7DC239E621E.description: Weeping Vines grow downwards from a ceiling. You can gather them with Mechanical Harvesters.
For style points, you can use the same contraption to harvest both vine types simultaneously.
cabin.quest.7E59B7DC239E621E.subtitle: Contraption 17-2
cabin.quest.7E59B7DC239E621E.title: The Double Decker II
cabin.quest.7F4D9F958EBDEAF8.title: 4x Glowshroom
cabin.quest.7F7ACF3B774E9D0E.title: 16x Jungle Log
cabin.quest.7FC4D1E69377271D.description: Congrats! Now you have a passive supply of Precision Mechanisms. Think of all the options you have access to!
After cleaning up and briefly scanning for bottlenecks, go ahead and check back with the Overview section.
cabin.quest.7FC4D1E69377271D.title: Chapter 2 Complete!
